files.patch:
@@ -1994,2 +1994,1 @@
-        for (int rootBits = (int) r.bitLength(); rootShift >= rootBits
-                && rootBits > 0; rootBits <<= 1) { // avoid overflow
+        for (int rootBits = (int) r.bitLength(); rootShift >= rootBits; rootBits <<= 1) {
@@ -2004,1 +2003,1 @@
-                x.add(ONE); // round up to ensure r1 is an upper bound of the root
+                x.add(ONE); // round up to ensure r is an upper bound of the root
